item.title: My take on Woman, thy place is at home
item.description: I read an article over at Messy Thoughts which I think is an excellent take on the issue of ‘useless education’. Go ahead read it first and come back, I'll wait. I am totally for education itself and improving oneself, but to get a degree and not use it, is an insult to education itself. Maybe you say, it is their own (or their parent's atleast) money, and it is for them to do with as they will.
